summary: Entrepreneur, mentor and educator.  Expertise in Medicinal Chemistry, Small molecules, Natural products, Antibody Drug Conjugates (ADC), DNA Encoded Libraries (DEL), Peptide Nucleic Acids (PNA), Oligonucleotides and Peptides.  Therapeutic areas: oncology, metabolic diseases, anti-infective and neurodegenerative diseases.

currentPositions.description: CreaGen provides preclinical drug discovery research services to biotech, pharmaceutical companies and academic institutes: High speed medicinal chemistry, high throughput synthesis and purification, Antibody Drug Conjugates (ADC), DNA Encoded Libraries (DEL), Peptide Nucleic Acids (PNA), Oligonucleotide and Peptides synthesis.  CreaGen Life Science Accelerator (C2I), a division of CreaGen corporation, provides fully equipped state of the art chemistry and biology laboratory space for life science start-up companies. C2I is the only fully equipped chemistry focused accelerator in the commonwealth of Massachusetts.
currentPositions.title: Founder & CEO

projects.description: CreaGen Biosciences has launched its life science research incubator, CreaGen Chemistry Incubator - C2I after successfully testing the business model with several emerging life science companies.  The C2I model is founded on CreaGen's commitment to excellence in chemistry and support of innovation through its growth oriented partnerships with its clients.  This flexible initiative provides entrepreneurs starting early stage companies an inexpensive place to launch, conduct POC studies, incubate and grow.  Unlike other regional incubators 'just providing docking stations, shared office space, biology labs or limited access to chemistry equipment, C2I provides all of this PLUS access to a true turn-key fully equipped and licensed chemistry facility 10 miles 10 minutes from Kendal square for half the price and yes even free parking!   As the lead for business development, contact me to arrange a tour.
projects.title: CreaGen Life Science Incubator (C2I)

educations.schoolName: Harvard Medical School - Massachusetts General Hospital

headline: Founder & CEO CreaGen Inc.

organizations.name: NAVIKA Boston 2013,  2nd World Kannada Conference
organizations.description:
NAVIKA is organizing an international conference that is taking place on August 30th, 31st and  September 1st, 2013 (Labor Day Weekend) at DCU/Mechanics Hall/Hanover Theater, Worcester, MA.  It is the Second World Kannada Conference that will bring over 3000 people to Massachusetts. The first conference was held at Pasadena Convention Center in 2010. The summit involves business/commerce/trade, continuing medical education, youth, and women’s forums.  In addition, it includes three days of South Asian entertainment with traditional dance, music, drama and movies. Dignitaries, celebrities and famous artists will be participating in the summit. 

If you’d like to be a dignitary in this exciting event, please contact me. Email: chair2013@navika.org

WeB: www.navika.org/2013
FB:NAVU VISWA KANNADIGARU

title.text: C2I Accelerate Exhibitor and Demo Lab Event on May 22.

message.text:
Explore Innovation at C2I Accelerator!
Join us on May 22nd between 11:00 AM and 1:00 PM to discover the latest technologies, instruments, and demo lab. Experience innovation firsthand at our showcase event! Enjoy free registration, networking lunch, and participation in our raffle.
Please use the following link for free registration: https://lnkd.in/eJ6-3GsU
